Heal Yourself & Move is platform dedicated to supporting people live a progressive life. Drawing from our own journery, we aim to guide you by sharing and providing resources.

About

Friedrich Neitzsche

Learn & Move

Knowledge really is power. But the aquisition of knowledge (certainly that which covers understanding ourselfs and things we can do to help us grow), is unfortunately a privelidge. To spread such information, we collate and present current top content on the self, physical health and neuroscience. Find out more and explore in our knowledge section!

Knowledge

Listen & Move

Music is our magic medicine. Its capacity to relate to how you are has a deep grounding effect which can help raise our awarness to our feelings. This is a platform for healing in it's self but the journey music can take you on beyond this can guide you to a better place. We endevour to highlight some of our favourite pieces that brung us positive energy over our life long tonic, music.

The Healing Place

Equip & Move

Our dedicated team that includes researchers, scietists and UX designers have created a variety products that we belive can effectively support in your healing and moving journey. These are designed to be accessible by being easy to adopt and also being afforable. We dedicate 50% of our profits to helping those in need through our knonweldge share programes and by donating products to school, communities and charities.
